title: A1286 early 2011 running extremly slow
message: Hi ive got an A1286 early 2011 that is running extremly slow, ive run the diagnostics and no errors apart from complaining about battery which im guessing because its not an original, anybody got any glues where to start looking, ive already had a good look at the board and theres no signs of water damage at all

title: A1286 early 2011 running extremly slow
message: Try another battery, also be prepared to get it back soon for a dead GPU...

title: A1286 early 2011 running extremly slow
message: Which battery error? The not sealed/unsealed error can be ignored.

title: A1286 early 2011 running extremly slow
message: Hi thanks for the questions, error message is  4xxx/4/40000005: "battery" tried to google it but nothing came back , i tried it without battery installed and still runs slow, i mean painfully slow :-)

title: A1286 early 2011 running extremly slow
message: Please run the real EFI ASD and not the built in garbage.

title: A1286 early 2011 running extremly slow
message: Hi Duke as far as i can make out i need version 3S144 but i cant seam to find it anywhere , is there another version i can run ? , sorry if i sound a bit thick :-) but im new to this

title: A1286 early 2011 running extremly slow
message: No, there is a torrent out there with all ASDs, something like 60GB total. Google is your friend here.

title: A1286 early 2011 running extremly slow
message: Hi Duke finally got asd 3s144, ran it in efi mode 6 times with no errors reported so then ran in os mode and it did come up with error 28 mux switching failed- didnt switch error and also error 255 unkown result - code 0xff , im guessing could that mean the graphics chip is on the way out ??

title: A1286 early 2011 running extremly slow
message: Try a known good ORIGINAL battery, can even be from a 13" for testing.

title: A1286 early 2011 running extremly slow
message: hi , eventually got a good battery and error 255 has gone but error 28 mux switching failed- didnt switch error is still there , would this be down to the graphics chip about to fail ???

title: A1286 early 2011 running extremly slow
message: It will be a bad GPU or MUX. GPU should be replaced as it will be dead soon anyway. Good luck finding chips....
